title: How to work for Elon Musk - Quora

response.answer_text: Well I wanted to work for him as well so I used LinkedIn platform for finding out. It provides you a facility to search profiles according to your filters. You can add filters like "Working: Tesla motors" or "SpaceX". Checkout different profiles of employees and their educational history. You will get some idea of where to start with. On the side note- I didn't get enough scores to get admission in any of the universities from where they hire engineers.
